titles.title: Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
A bill to authorize major medical facility projects for the Department of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Tester with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 24.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Bost moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 30.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Fiscal Year 2023 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
This act authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to carry out specified major medical facility projects during FY2023. The bill also indicates the maximum amount that can be spent on each project.
